channel.title: Mad Libs Forms on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Mad Libs Forms on Konigi

item.title: Kelley Blue Book Mad Libs Form
item.description:
The Kelley Blue Book features Mad Libs-style inline form elements for its contact form. The contact form, which was previously displayed with right-aligned labels adjacent to to left aligned fields, is now displayed as an inline form with "fill in the blanks" style prompts for input.
http://www.kbb.com/

item.title: Huffduffer Registration
item.description: Huffduffer, a hybrid bookmarking/podcast service features a whimsical inline registration form that's formatted in sentences with blank areas that the user fills out with their name, password, etc. Kind of a fun, unexpected way to format the form. Reminds me of the kinds of forms you'd fill out by hand in days of old, which goes with the retro style of the site. Via SwissMiss. http://huffduffer.com/signup/
